Glossary

Glossary of Terms

  • ChocAn: Organization dedicated to helping people addicted to chocolate.
  • Members: People using the ChocAn service. They also posses a plastic card, which contains their information and nine digit member number.
  • Provider: Health care professionals who provide service to members.
  • Suspended: This means that the member's membership has been stopped, because the member has not paid membership fees for at least a month.
  • 6-digit service code: This code corresponds to the type of service provided.
  • Fee: The amount of money to be paid to the provider by ChocAn. (totaled every week)
  • Provider Directory: An alphabetically ordered list of service names and corresponding service codes and fees.
  • Member Report: Printed at the ChocAn data center. Contains member's name, number, address, city, state, and ZIP code. Also contains every service provided.(Service name, date of service, provider name)
  • Provider Report: Contains provider's name, number, address, city, state, total consultations & fees, and ZIP code. Also contains every service provided.(date, member name and number, service code, and fees)
  • Summary Report: Given to manager. Lists every provider to be paid that week, the number of consultations each had, and his or her total fee for that week.
  • Acme Accounting Services: Third party responsible for financial procedures such as recording payments of membership fees, suspending members whose fees are overdue, and reinstating suspended members who have now paid what they owed.
  • EFT(Electronic Funds Transfer): A file should be set up containing the provider name, provider number, and the amount to be transferred.
